pkgmetadata.longdescription: Extract Data from Professional Volleyball Leagues in North America // Gather boxscore, play-by-play, and auxiliary data from Major League Volleyball (MLV) https://provolleyball.com, League One Volleyball Pro (LOVB Pro) https://www.lovb.com/pro- league, and Athletes Unlimited Pro Volleyball https://auprosports.com/volleyball/ to create a repository of basic and advanced statistics for teams and players.
